description: Spicy Korean Carrot Salad, or so it's called where I come from.
keywords: Salad,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Spicy Carrot Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Dice your onion, cook in butter on low to medium heat until softens and becomes translucent.

HowToTip.tipText: Even though it may seem like a lot of carrots, it will half in size once marinated.

recipeInstructions.text: Julienne your carrots (or use already sliced one from woollies) and mince your garlic.

HowToTip.tipText: Start with less sugar, pepper and vinegar and add more to your taste.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the ingredient together (including all the remaining ones) and let it marinate for 5 min.
